title: AE/PR插件：扣像边缘模拟真实光照效果Digital Anarchy：Light Wrap Fantastic v1.0.2
author: 大众脸
content: Lightwrap Fantastic插件可以让AE方便的控制抠像边缘，融合更加真实的边缘光照效果。The Light Wrap Fantastic enables better composites by easily allowing users to blend the background with the foreground in such a way that it appears the light of the background is affecting the foreground. Essentially simulating backlighting. The plugin has all the controls you need to create a realistic light wrap making it a quick and easy process。注：插件为一键安装版本，直接安装后即可使用
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CS6, CC, CC 2014, CC 2015; Adobe Premiere Pro CS6, CC, CC 2014, CC 2015

download_links.name: AE/PR插件：扣像边缘模拟真实光照效果Digital Anarchy：Light Wrap Fantastic v1.0.2
